ValidationRule.description: Before moving to Project Status "Application Approved" the following mandatory fields must be filled: Name, Contract Eligibility Start Date, SOS Lead Organization.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( OR( ISBLANK(Name), ISBLANK(Contract_Eligibility_Start_Date__c), ISBLANK(Applicant_Accountable_Organisation__c) ), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Grant',
OR( ISPICKVAL(ampi__Project_Status__c , 'Application Approved'), ISPICKVAL(ampi__Project_Status__c , 'Application Rejected'), ISPICKVAL(ampi__Project_Status__c , 'In Implementation'), ISPICKVAL(ampi__Project_Status__c , 'Cancelled'), ISPICKVAL(Phase__c , 'Implementation'), ISPICKVAL(Phase__c , 'Closure') ) )
